import React from 'react'; import validate from '../hooks/useValidateForm'; import useForm from '../hooks/useForm'; const ProfileForm = () => { const getTime = () => { var d = new Date(); var time = d.getHours(); if (time < 12) { return 'Good morning'; } if (time > 12 && time < 17) { return 'Good afternoon'; } if (time > 17 && time < 24) { return 'Good evening'; } }; const login = () => { console.log(values); }; const { values, handleChange, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm( login, validate ); return (
e.preventDefault()}>
